::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer/Scyther/Darkmouse::

Killfest recieves Sphink's message, frowning. He knew he couldn't 
reply, but he wished he could for a second. He snaps his head in 
Scyther's direction as the bot spinns around.

"We're being watched," Scyther says, growling slightly. He points at 
a clump of bushes, "There, in those bushes. Predacon female."

Killfest nods and motions toward the bush. EndBringer and Greven walk 
over to it, their weapons ready to fire.

"Stand up with your hands above your head," Greven orders, "Or we 
will fire."

While his troops dealt with the intruder, Killfest sends a 
transmission to Magmatron.

"Magmatron," the transmission read, "This is commander Killfest. We 
might need the help of your troops at our base soon. Can you spare 
any?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Darkmouse catches up with the rest of the group, looking 
questioningly at Greven and EndBringer, who were aiming their weapons 
at a bush.
